title: How to make a melody like Brooks - Quora

response.answer_text: Listen to his songs and get inspired I don’t listen to brooks alot but i guess his style os future house or bounce type. As i know future house or future bounce has a bouncy type of feel. Like if you have listen to his song boomrang you can feel that bouncy type things. All i can suggest is make unique bass pattern and follow every thing according to bass 😄
